5079.74.text: your unjust enmity against my father.

5082.39.text:
But on account of those you have
despoiled and oppressed, I take this money,

5086.94.text:
and will use it far more
worthily than you would.

5090.09.text: God be my witness in this!

5092.06.text:
There is an end of
the matter, unless you will lead us in a song

5095.10.text:
or dance to show that
your body had a better spirit than your mind.

5098.62.text:
Come, strike up the harp,
Allan!"

5100.71.text:
"Neither the one nor the other will I do,"
snarled the Bishop.

5104.87.text:
"Faith, then we must help you," said Little
John; and he and

5108.84.text:
Arthur-a-Bland seized the fat struggling churchman
and commenced to hop

5114.10.text:
The Bishop being shorter must perforce accompany
them in

5117.33.text:
their gyrations; while the whole company sat
and rolled about over the

5121.53.text:
ground, and roared to see my lord of Hereford's
queer capers.

5125.63.text:
At last he
sank in a heap, fuddled with wine and quite

5130.09.text:
Little John picked him up as though he were
a log of wood and carrying

5133.33.text:
him to his horse, set him astride facing the
animal's tail; and thus

5137.94.text:
fastened him, leading the animal toward the
highroad and, starting the

5141.96.text: Bishop, more dead than alive, toward Nottingham.
